title: 3 Killed in Russian Attack on Ukraine's Kherson
description: Kherson, which Ukraine retook one year ago, has been subject to daily shelling attacks from Russian forces on the other side of the vast waterway.
artist: The Moscow Times - Independent News From Russia
album: The Moscow Times - Independent News From Russia

title: EU To Put Forward New Sanctions on Russia This Week
description: The proposals include banning Moscow's lucrative diamond exports.

title: Lithuania Moves to Strip Ballerina's Citizenship Over Pro-Putin Remarks – Reports
description: The 59-year-old Ilze Liepa said she was “ashamed” of Western policies toward Moscow, contrasting them with Putin’s “service to the motherland.”

title: Putin’s Daughter Joins Moscow Genetics Society, Criticizes Russian Laws – Mozhem Obyasnit
description: In her role at the medical organization, Maria Vorontsova has criticized patient care laws adopted while her father was president.

title: Jailed Moscow City Councilor Faces ‘Terrorism’ Charges
description: Alexei Gorinov was the first person to receive prison time under Russia’s new laws criminalizing anti-war protests amid the full-scale invasion of Ukraine.

title: Russia Claims Killed 34 in Syrian Air Strikes

title: Navalny Ally Fadeyeva Transferred to Detention Center
description: Ksenia Fadeyeva is a former municipal deputy in the Siberian city of Tomsk and was added to Russia's "terrorist" list in January 2022.

title: Far East Region Struggles to Meet Kremlin’s Military Recruitment Quotas, Leaked Video Shows
description: The video appears the be the first clear evidence of regional quotas for military volunteers to be sent to fight in Ukraine.

title: Navalny Accuses Russian Prison of Withholding Wife’s ‘Criminal’ Letters

title: Putin Re-Election Campaign Begins Enlisting Surrogates – Kommersant

title: Russia's Military Announces, Then Backtracks on 'Regrouping' in Southern Ukraine
